item.title: Frenchies Grooming Tips
item.author: adopt@ethicalfrenchie.com (James Harrison)
item.description: Dogs donâ€™t require everyday grooming as humans do. You should bathe your French Bulldog when necessary, but not more than once a month, unless required by your vet.
